payload.title: Establish New 10 EARS Minimum Standard
payload.description: Elevate minimum EARS standard from 7 to 10 based on achievements of 4 perfected adapters. Update adapter_designer.md with new standard, update audit criteria, and document that 10+ EARS is new enterprise minimum. Include edge cases and validation in EARS requirements.
payload.notes: Standard elevation reflecting natural evolution toward greater precision and coverage in functional requirements.
